src:
S pištolo v roki zahteval denar
04 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Spletno uredništvo

V soboto sredi dneva je v trgovini na Vanganelski cesti v Kopru zamaskiran moški s pištolo v roki od prodajalca zahteval denar.



Fotografija je simbolična. 

KOPER > V soboto ob 13.03 so policisti dobili klic, da je pred 15 minutami v trgovino na Vanganelski cesti v Kopru prišel zamaskiran moški. Stopil je do blagajniškega pulta in od prodajalca zahteval denar, grožnje pa podkrepil s pištolo.
Zatem je pritisnil na ekran blagajne, da bi odprl predal z denarjem, kar pa mu ni uspelo in je od dejanja odstopil ter pobegnil.
Policisti nadaljujejo z zbiranjem informacij.
text:
With a gun in his hand, he demanded money
04 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Web Editing

On Saturday, in the middle of the day, a masked man with a gun in his hand demanded money from a salesman at a shop on Vanganelska Street in Koper.



Photography is symbolic.

KOPER> A police officer received a call on Saturday at 1.03pm that a masked man had arrived at a shop on Vanganelska Street in Koper 15 minutes ago. He walked over to the cashier's desk and demanded money from the seller, backing up his threats with a gun.
He then pressed the cash register screen to open the cash drawer, which he failed to do and he resigned from the action and fled.
Police officers continue to gather information.
